AutoDisplayState - Class in org.jtrim2.property.swing
Defines static utility methods to allow automatically changing the state of Swing components (e.g.: between enabled and disabled).

D

DelayedGlassPane - Class in org.jtrim2.property.swing
Defines the factories for glass panes where one glass pane is to be set immediately and the other is to replace it after the specified timeout, if the glass pane is still needed.
DelayedGlassPane(GlassPaneFactory, long, TimeUnit) - Constructor for class org.jtrim2.property.swing.DelayedGlassPane
Creates the DelayedGlassPane with the given panel factory and timeout to replace the panel applied immediately.
DelayedGlassPane(GlassPaneFactory, GlassPaneFactory, long, TimeUnit) - Constructor for class org.jtrim2.property.swing.DelayedGlassPane
Creates the DelayedGlassPane with the given panel factories and timeout to replace the panel applied immediately.
documentText(Document) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.property.swing.SwingProperties

G

getGlassPanePatience(TimeUnit) - Method in class org.jtrim2.property.swing.DelayedGlassPane
Returns the time to wait to use the panels created by the MainGlassPane instead of the ones created by the ImmediateGlassPane in the given time unit.
getImmediateGlassPane() - Method in class org.jtrim2.property.swing.DelayedGlassPane
Returns the glass pane factory whose panels are used to replace the glass pane of the decorated component immediately when the glass pane is to be applied to the associated component.
getMainGlassPane() - Method in class org.jtrim2.property.swing.DelayedGlassPane
Returns the glass pane factory whose panels are used to replace the glass pane of the decorated component after the given timeout elapses and if the glass pane is still needed to be applied to the associated component.
getValue() - Method in interface org.jtrim2.property.swing.SwingPropertySource

GlassPaneFactory - Interface in org.jtrim2.property.swing
Defines an interface creating JPanel instances as a glass pane for Swing components (those that have glass pane).

I
